# gux-blank-state

## Slots

| Slot                    | Description                                 |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| `"additional-guidance"` | Slot for additional-guidance.               |
| `"call-to-action"`      | Slot for the message call to action button. |
| `"image"`               | Slot for gux-icon element.                  |
| `"primary-message"`     | Required slot for primary-message.          |
